characters/alexandria-crew/alora.html.title: Alora
characters/alexandria-crew/alora.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: She / Her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Non-Player Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Species:: Liberated Borg Role:: Nurse
Portrait:: Note:: Ex-Borg looking for a lost sense of connection Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Found some kinship with Eelara, as they both need closeness.
Both Alora and Walter Beck have shared experiences on Frontier worlds. Alora grew up on a frontier colony world, where she leaned to take care of animals first, and then people. At some point, the borg invaded and Alora was assimilated.Sometime after that, Alora was liberated from the Borg. Since then, she found a career in Starfleet as a ship nurse. On the USS Alexandria, she has found kinship with both Eelara and

characters/alexandria-crew/andy-markham..title: Andy Markham
characters/alexandria-crew/andy-markham..description:
Note Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Player Character NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lt. Commander Species:: Human Role:: Intelligence Officer Pronouns:: he/him
Portrait:: Note:: Recruited by Starfleet Intelligence and trusted by the captain Player:: David Value1:: Take care of your people, and your people will take care of the mission Value2:: When you wear that uniform, you're a part of something bigger than yourself. Value3:: Sometimes a terrible decision is the best decision you've got. Value4:: Quick and decisive. Andy and [Eelara] both agree: you cannot miss the nightly social functions on the USS Alexandria.
Relja Zecevic and Andy are both the type of people who take the initiative, but Andy's Starfleet Intelligence connections make him harder to trust for Relja.
T'Mel Marie Williamson tends to dislike Andy's tendency to look before he leaps. T'Mel will sometimes act as Andy's conscience.
Both Andy and Hemel Jiqari have had complicated relationships with their political parents, which they've bonded over.
Andy is a regular with Plek's counselling services.
Both Avery and Andy are members of Starfleet Intelligence, which comes with both mutual trust and distrust.
Captain Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso moved Andy into his current position in the Command division after recognizing Andy's potential as a leader.

characters/alexandria-crew/avery-helsing.title: Avery Helsing
characters/alexandria-crew/avery-helsing.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Non-Player Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 2 Rank:: Commander Species:: Human Role:: XO, Chief of Security
Portrait:: Note:: No nonsense commander with strong ties to Starfleet Intelligence
Second in command. Normally found in The Bridge. Assigned to the Alexandria on request from Starfleet IntelligenceValue1:: The mission always comes first Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Walter Beck reports directly to Helsing. In his command, Helsing tends to value the mission over the lives of the crew.
Both Helsing and Andy Markham as members of Starfleet Intelligence. This comes with with both mutual trust and distrust of each other.
Assigned to the ship against the wishes of Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso.

characters/alexandria-crew/braag-lorin-p.title: Braag lorin Pag
characters/alexandria-crew/braag-lorin-p.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned Rank:: Lt. Commander NumRank:: 3 Species:: Tellarite Role:: Engineering Specialist
Portrait:: Note:: Previously covered Walter Beck's mistake before it went bad Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Fixed a mistake for Walter Beck before it went bad.
Reports to Relja Zecevic

characters/alexandria-crew/durall.html.title: Durall
characters/alexandria-crew/durall.html.description:
Info Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Non-Player Character NumRank:: 5 Status:: Commissioned Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Trill Role:: Communications Officer
Portrait:: Note:: Got Eelara's preferred role on the ship. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Durall has been a rival to Eelara, and took her preferred bridge position as the Communications Officer.

characters/alexandria-crew/eelara.html.title: Eelara
characters/alexandria-crew/eelara.html.description:
Note Pronouns:: she/her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Player Character NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Denobulan Role:: Operations Manager
Portrait:: Note:: A friendly face seeking wellbeing amongst the stars. Player:: Jessie Value1:: It's the journey, not the destination Value2:: Never stop learning Value3:: A good mystery is irresistible Value4:: Being friendly can get you far
Both Andy Markham and Eelara agree: you cannot miss the Alexandria's nightly social functions.
Eelara has a habit of trying to collaborate with Walter Beck when he'd rather work alone.
Relja Zecevic recognized Eelara's engineering talent and promoted her to the bridge as a "punishment"
Eelara and Plek both agree on a philosophy of wellness through play.
Eelara and Alora are "ship siblings". They both come from places where they are accustomed to a high level of closeness with the people around them. Alora misses the connection she felt as a Borg, and Eelara is a Denobulan.
Durall has been a rival to Eelara, and took her preferred bridge position as the Communications Officer.

characters/alexandria-crew/grace-hopper..title: Grace Hopper
characters/alexandria-crew/grace-hopper..description:
Info Pronouns:: She/Her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 5 Rank:: Lieutenant JG Species:: Trill Role:: Lab Technician
Portrait:: Note:: Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::

characters/alexandria-crew/hemel-jiqari..title: Hemel Jiqari
characters/alexandria-crew/hemel-jiqari..description:
**Info Pronouns:: She/her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: SC Status:: Civilian Rank:: Civilian Species:: Bajoran-Cardassian Role:: Passenger
Portrait:: Note:: Bonded with Andy Markham over having a difficulty relationship with their parents. Player:: David Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Bonded with Andy Markham over having a difficulty relationship with their parents.

characters/alexandria-crew/kala-cerjaso..title: Kala Cerjaso
characters/alexandria-crew/kala-cerjaso..description:
Info Pronouns:: She / Her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 1 Rank:: Captain Species:: Bajoran Role:: Commanding Officer
Portrait:: Note:: On her first assignment as captain and in over her head. Value1:: We all signed up knowing the risks Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Cerjaso moved Andy Markham into the Command Division after recognizing his potential as a leader.
Avery Helsing was assigned to the Alexandra against Cerjaso's wishes as Starfleet Intelligence wanted to keep an eye on her and the situation.

characters/alexandria-crew/plek.html.title: Plek
characters/alexandria-crew/plek.html.description:
Plek## SummaryInfo Pronouns:: he/him Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Species:: Ferengi Role:: Ship Councillor
Portrait:: Note:: Helps others find profit in their own wellbeing. Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Plek and Eelara agree on the important of mental wellbeing.
Andy Markham is a regular to visit Plek.
Walter Beck is working through some survivor's guilt after theri ship was destroyed.
Often helps coach the Renal Kayto on how to express themselves.

characters/alexandria-crew/relja-zecevic.title: Relja Zecevic
characters/alexandria-crew/relja-zecevic.description:
Note Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Player Character Rank:: Lt. Commander NumRank:: 3 Pronouns:: he/him Species:: Human Role:: Chief Engineer
Portrait:: Note:: A pragmatic, no-fuss engineer who takes the initiative. Value1:: Trust, but verify Value2:: Sensors can't tell you everything Value3:: Good Leaders get their hands dirty Value4:: The mission comes first
Walter Beck and Relja served on the same ship making an evacuation effort before the Romulus Supernova.
Relja and Andy Markham tend to agree on taking the initiative and acting quickly. But Relja has a hard time trusting Andy's Starfleet Intelligence background.
Relja recognized Eelara's engineering talent and promoted her to the bridge as a "punishment"
Braag lorin Pag Reports directly Relja.
Relja and Renal Kayto often enjoy sharing moments of silence on the otherwise hectic ship.
Reljia rescued Nitrina thinking she sought sanctuary ahead of the Romulus supernova. She ended up being a Tal Shiar agent who transmitted the names of Romulans seeking sanctuary back to Romulus. Picked up a Romulan refugee, ended up being a Tal-Shiar spy.
Nitrina was caught by Relja just after she transmitted the names of all the people seeking sanctuary back to Romulus. The plan of course to use any family that had remaining to force them to come back. Nitrina made her escape (transported off to a cloaked BoP) before Relja could stop her. Relja knew he had doomed those people and their families because he didn't stop the spy. This devastated him. Made worse by the fact that not long thereafter the ship itself gets destroyed Since the ship going down is Jeff's event, I don't wanna say directly that Nitrina was involved/responsible, but no matter what truth we settle on Relja as a character will think she absolutely had something to do with it, meaning Relja bears responsibility for it). So all that sends Relja into a spiral. His long time friend, the Alexandria's CMO, finally gets him back on his feet.

characters/alexandria-crew/renal-kayto.h.title: Renal Kayto
characters/alexandria-crew/renal-kayto.h.description:
Info Pronouns:: she/her Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Supporting Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 4 Rank:: Lieutenant Species:: Betazed Role:: Transport Chief
Portrait:: Note:: Enjoys quite moments with Relja occasionally. Player:: Russel (description)Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Comfortable sharing a quiet moment with Relja Zecevic.
Plek is helping Renal to learn how to communicate his emotions verbally.
Statblock:: Renal Kayto Stats

characters/alexandria-crew/t'mel-marie-w.title: T'Mel Marie Williamson
characters/alexandria-crew/t'mel-marie-w.description:

Portrait:: Note:: Xeno-Anthropologist who prefers caution over daring decision making. Player:: David Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::
Close associates with Andy Markham, who she thinks acts too brashly.

characters/alexandria-crew/tropp.html.description: Info Location:: USS Alexandria Pronouns:: he/him NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Lieutenant Commander Type:: Player Character Status:: Commissioned Species:: Denobulan Role:: Science Officer Portrait:: Note:: Value1:: Value2:: Value3:: Value4::

characters/alexandria-crew/walter-beck.h.title: Walter Beck
characters/alexandria-crew/walter-beck.h.description:
Info Pronouns:: he / him Location:: USS Alexandria Type:: Player Character NumRank:: 8 Status:: Enlisted Rank:: Petty Officer Third Class Species:: Human Role:: Field Medic
Portrait:: Note:: A battle hardened medic who gets the job done. Player:: Jeff Value1:: Security is more than just a job Value2:: Willing to sacrifice myself to save my crew Value3:: A Starship is nothing without its crew Value4:: Stand up against Injustice
Walter saved Relja Zecevic's life when their ship was destroyed.
Eelara ha a habit of trying to collaborate with Walter when he'd rather work alone.
Braag lorin Pag fixed a mistake Walter made on a mission before it went bad, saving Walter's career
Alora and Walter work closely together in the sick bay. They are also both from frontier worlds and understand what it takes to be self sufficient.
Walter talks to Plek about his traumatic experience having his ship blown up.
Walter reports directly to Avery Helsing, who always insists that the mission comes first, sometimes even above casualties.

characters/livara.html.title: Livara
characters/livara.html.description: Info Pronouns:: she / her Location:: Shackleton Expanse/Locations/Shackleton Expanse/The Shackleton Expanse Type:: Non-Player Character Status:: Commissioned NumRank:: 3 Rank:: Centurion Species:: Romulan Role:: Scientist Portrait:: Note:: A Tal'Shiar scientist in charge of seeking out new weapons technologies for the Romulan Empire. Value1:: The Romulan Star Empire will be everlasting. Value2:: Value3:: Value4:: Statblock:: portrait-nobg:: portrait-bg:: token-bg:: token-white::

sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-1.title: Andy Markham Log 1.2
sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-1.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
Character:: Andy Markham Stardate:: 67988Log:: Discovered ancient technology with immense gravity-based power. Stopped gravitational cataclysm via joint communication between Romulan and Starfleet.

sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-2.title: Andy Markham Log 2.1
sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-2.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist
Character:: Andy Markham Stardate:: 68063Log:: Investigated artifact on Narendra Station, tracked down SS Castle Rock, reclaimed artifact

sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-2.title: Andy Markham Log 2.2
sessions/mission-logs/andy-markham-log-2.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
Character:: Andy Markham Stardate:: 68084Log:: Romulans boarded the Alexandria and attempted to steal the ancient artifact. Romulans contained; sent into subspace, first contact with Tillkar Empire within subspace.

sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-1.2.htm.title: Eelara Log 1.2
sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-1.2.htm.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
Character:: Eelara Stardate:: 67988Log:: The ship was knocked about by a subspace wave in the Bacchus system. The wave originated from a monolith structure on the surface of Bacchus-3. We discovered a colony of cloistered Romulan scientists on the planet, and we helped them deactivate a rogue experiment, resulting in planet-wide earthquakes. I had just enough time to download some of the alien data from the control console before being beamed to safety!

sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-2.1.htm.title: Eelara Log 2.1
sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-2.1.htm.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist
Character:: Eelara Stardate:: 68063
Log:: We arrived at Narendra for some much needed shore leave before venturing into the Shackleton Expanse. On board the station, the crew and I visited the wrestling venue hosted by Laza (a Ferengi). I tried chatting with some Klingon women and when I turned around Relja was getting in the ring with the champion. The next morning we were approached by Admiral Stoker and Cmdr Helsing about an artifact that had been stolen from the station. The markings on the artifact matched those within the alien complex we had discovered on Bacchus-3.I set out to investigate the room where the artifact was stored for clues, while Relja and Andy questioned Laza. I determined that we were likely looking for an Orion, and Laza let spill that the Romulans had hired Orions to steal the artifact. He said that the transport vessel carrying the artifact had left the station within the last few hours, heading to the Romulan Neutral Zone. We mustered a skeleton crew from shore leave and burned the engines as hard as we could to catch up before they reached Romulan space.We managed to catch them just in time to see the aft section of the vessel implode, dealing catastrophic structural damage to the transport. We took a shuttle to the vessel and Andy and Relja convinced the Orion captain to let us help. Somehow the artifact was holding all of the ships atmosphere in place, despite the hull breaches. One of the Orion crewmembers was communicating with the artifact via a neuro-link. I set up the jamming signal that we previously used on Bacchus-3 using my tricorder, while we simultaneously transported back to the Alexandria; since cancelling out the artifact caused all of the ship's atmosphere to vent through the breaches and out into space. Once we were safely back aboard the Alexandria, Andy managed to hack the Orion crew-member's neuro-link and tell the artifact to deactivate, just as a Romulan Bird of Prey de-cloaked!

sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-2.2.htm.title: Eelara Log 2.2
sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-2.2.htm.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
Character:: Eelara Stardate:: 68084Log:: We dealt with the Romulan threat by using the recovered relic to plunge our ship deep into subspace. This inadvertently drew the attention of a subspace-dwelling Alien Empire.

sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-4.html.title: Eelara Log 4
sessions/mission-logs/eelara-log-4.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 4.1 - Simplicity
Character:: Eelara Stardate:: 66942Log:: After the Romulan encounter resulted in a boarding party infiltrating the ship, the security precautions and training exercises have been bumped up aboard the Alexandria (Everyone is working 10hr shifts instead of 8, with 2hrs mandatory security training).Admiral Stoker arrives via a Romulan shuttle and takes command of the Alexandria. Andy asked me to pull the logs off of the shuttlepod. I discovered that the admiral was recently aboard the IRW Adjacium - Warbird (former) - The log reads that Admiral Stoker had to fight her way out.She orders us to Pasqual-1 at maximum warp, on radio silence. We dangerously beam down to the planet through heavy EM interference. Eelara and Walter open and then deactivate one of the monoliths near a mixed society living a technology-free way of life.I navigated that situation as a first contact scenario with a pre-warp society to avoid contaminating their culture. Opening the structure inadvertently caused the nearby villagers great physical pain, and shutting it off stopped the torment. In orbit, the Romulans appear and accuse the Admiral of being under the influence of the Tilikaal.

sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-1.title: Kala Cerjaso Log 1.1
sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-1.description:
Character:: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.1 - Bacchus-3 Stardate:: 67988Log:: The Alexandria has been pulled out of orbit by a massive subspace distortion wave. We were barely able to get the power back on in time to avoid falling into the systems sun. The distortion wave is emanating from an M-Class planet in the system. While Lt. Eelara has been able to shield out internal systems from the affects, we cannot go to warp or use transports outside the ship. I've sent an away team to the planet to investigate.

sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-1.title: Kala Cerjaso Log 1.2
sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-1.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
Character:: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso Stardate:: 67988Log:: Even without being in communication range, my away team successfully managed to deactivate the subspace distortion field. It's unclear who built the device, but they couple possible have ancient connections to the Vulcans and Romulans. The Romulans we found on the surface escaped in their own shuttle, no doubt to go investigate Relja's claims that Romulus has been destroyed. Since our away team never found the missing scout ship, it's possible they are with the Romulans, or they fell into the system's star like the Alexandria almost did. I'm leaving that case file open for now. As they left Bacchus-3, the away team was able to recover a large database of information from the alien computers. I am setting course for Narendra Station outside Romulan territory, where I will debrief with Admiral Stoker and discuss our next assignment.)

sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-2.title: Kala Cerjaso Log 2.1
sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-2.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist
Character:: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso Stardate:: 68063Log:: After an artifact strongly resembling the monolith from Bacchus-3 was stolen from Narendra Station, the USS Nightingale pursued the Orion freighter SS Castle Rock. The freighter was diabled when the artifact collapsed its hull with a subspace distortion wave similar to the one we encountered before at a smaller scale. My away team has since taken custody of the artifact and some of the the Orion crew. Captain Paljara of the SS Castle Rock is now in our transporter room.Soon after the away team beamed on board, a Romulan Warbird, which was meant to rendevouz with the Orion freighter, has now de-cloaked nearby. They will undoubtably want the artifact for themselves. The ship has gone to red alert. Since the artifact has potential for military weapons research, it is paramount we protect it.

sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-2.title: Kala Cerjaso Log 2.2
sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-2.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
Character:: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso Stardate:: 68084Log:: After beaming our away team back onto the Alexandria with the stolen artifact, a Romulan warship War Bird decloaked nearby. We were barely able to raise our shields in time. I gave the away team order to protect the artifact.On the bridge, we began evasive maneuvers, but the Romulan disruptor banks quickly depleted our shields. Soon after, we were boarded.Lucky, our engineering team was able to use the artifact itself to repel the Romulan ship, stranding itself boarding party on the Alexandria. We neutralized the invaders.However, using the artifact this way plunged the ship deep into subspace. There, we received a warning and order to stay still while some unknown entity investigated. We weren't going to stick around to find out who that was. We deactivated the artifact and returned to normal space safely.
The Romulan boarding party and the Orion pirates will be handed over to Starfleet Intelligence and Shackleton Expanse/Characters/Season 1/Admiral Banna Stoker on Narendra Station.

sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-3.title: Kala Cerjaso Log 3
sessions/mission-logs/kala-cerjaso-log-3.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You
Character:: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Characters/Alexandria Crew/Kala Cerjaso Stardate:: 67913.5Log:: While transporting colonists of Re Alpha to the Yacci system, many of the crew began behaving is strange and erratic ways. The cause of this ways narrowed down to a local produce called Ice Peas from Re Alpha. The crew was able to identify the cause as an allergic reaction and mitigated it by introducing a local mycelium to the ice peas transport substrate.

sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-1.2.html.title: Relja Log 1.2
sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-1.2.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
Character:: Relja Log 1.2 Stardate:: 67988Log:: Went to Bachus-3 to check on a missing Federation survey team. Got trapped in a subspace distortion wave effect. Unable to create a warp bubble to get away we became trapped in orbit around Bacchus-3. After restoring power to the ship I led an away team down to the planet where we encountered a secret Romulan science team (as if there is any other type). They were doing research on a series of monoliths that had already existed on the planet. Something caused the monoliths to become active and they are creating the distortion effect. After delicately negotiating with the leader of the Romulans, Livara, we got access to the monoliths. They were affecting people near them with a weird obsession. I was able to create a modification to our com badges that blocked the resonance (use of Value).After deftly disarming the security lasers we proceeded to find the control center. Once we arrive we trigger the system and it begins pulling other planets and the Alexandria into the planet. The team managed to disable security. and shut down the entire system. This caused the entire system to begin collapsing. I tried desperately to save the Romulan leader and her people but she wouldnt have it.

sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-2.1.html.title: Relja Log 2.1
sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-2.1.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist
Character:: Relja Zecevic Stardate:: 68063Log:: While on shore leave, we were recruited to track down a stolen relic that seems to be related to the incident on Bacchus-3. Alex and I played good cop bad cop with a local Ferengi fight promoter and got a lead on some Orions that had likely stolen the relic.I quickly called for the engineering team to prep the ship for departure. The Capt helped us scramble an emergency crew together and head out for the fleeing Orion ship. We managed to catch it, but of course the pirates denied any knowledge of the relic.At that point the Orion ship began to implode. Concerned for the safety of the Orions and needing to get the relic not only for Star Fleet but to keep it out of dangerous hand, we boarded the Orion ship. We initially made haste to try and save the crew, but quickly discovered that a crew member of the Orion ship was caught in some kind of mind meld with the artifact. Alex managed to get it to shut down and we all quickly got back to the Alexandria.Of course the Romulans behind this whole fiasco took that moment to decloak and make us aware they wanted the relic. please. without the please.

sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-2.2.html.title: Relja Log 2.2
sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-2.2.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
Character:: Relja Zecevic Stardate:: 68084Log:: After securing the relic from the Orions, we sent their poor officer to sick bay while we took the relic to the Lounge to review our options. The Romulans began attacking so we quickly shifted to Engineering to try and use the Relic to shore up the shields or push the Romulans away.While attempting to do this the Romulans were able to fully take down the shields long enough to board us. I focused on getting the relic online to secure it and to save the ship. (The Mission Comes First). With Eelara's help I managed to complete the task and pushed the Romulans away. then we used the device to duck into subspace to give us time to repair the ship.Unfortunately, some ancient empire messaged and said they were on their way to say hello, and it didnt sound like a friendly hello.

sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-3.html.title: Relja Log 3
sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-3.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You
Character:: Relja Zecevic Stardate:: 67913.5Log:: Visited Re Alpha and the locals asked us to engage in some diplomacy with the neighboring Yacci system.

sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-4.html.title: Relja Log 4
sessions/mission-logs/relja-log-4.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 4.2 - Complexity
Character:: Relja Zecevic Stardate:: 66942Log:: Admiral arrives at the ship and orders the crew to head directly a planet without delay and without any communication to anyone. Romulans appeared at the planet and demanded the Admiral be handed over to them. The captain stalled as long as possible nut eventually the Romulans attacked. The ship took a pretty hard hit but rallied and turned the tables on the Romulans, forcing them to flee. However they got caught in the gravity well of the planet and were going to plummet to their doom, but the Alexandria managed to stabilize their position in orbit, but had to beam over crew to help repair their engines. Relja beamed over and discovered his old flame. He wanted to leave immediately, but Andy reminded him to stick with eth mission and Relja helped repair the engines.

sessions/mission-logs/t'mel-log-1.1.html.title: T'Mel Log 1.1
sessions/mission-logs/t'mel-log-1.1.html.description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.1 - Bacchus-3
Character:: T'Mel Marie Williamson Stardate:: 67988Log:: I've been requested by the captain to join the away team down to Bacchus-3. Logically, they expect my xeno-anthropology experience to be of value to the team. I am of course happy to oblige.On the planet, we met a small colony of Romulans who have been completely cut off from the Romulan Empire and are unaware of the tragedy at Romulus. They are attempting to study a giant monolith in the planet. For this, I can be of assistance.While Relja negotiated peace with the Romulan leader, Livara, Walter and I inspected the monolith. It was covered in ancient runes which I was able to slightly decode.Dr Voraal inspected some of the Romulan scientists, who exhibited a strange enchantment with the monolith. We are unsure what is causing this, but Livara advised us to keep our distance and not stay close to the monolith for too long.

sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-1..title: Walter Beck Log 1.2
sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-1..description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
Character:: Walter Beck Stardate:: 67988Log:: Volunteered to be test subject for Communicator subspace shielding

sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-2..title: Walter Beck Log 2.2
sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-2..description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
Character:: Walter Beck Stardate:: 68084Log:: I charged Romulan boarder that attacked Alora

sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-3..title: Walter Beck Log 3
sessions/mission-logs/walter-beck-log-3..description:
Session:: Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You
Character:: Walter Beck Stardate:: 67913.5Log:: Scanned Eelara to determine what is affecting her.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-0-sess.title: Alexandria Log 0 - Session 0
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-0-sess.description: Summary Date:: 2024-12-13 Stardate:: Note:: The crew of the USS Alexandria was assembled and briefed for their first exploratory mission into Romulan territory. Alexandria Web Alexandria Mind Map

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-1.1-ba.title: Alexandria Log 1.1 - Bacchus-3
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-1.1-ba.description: Stardate:: 67988 Mission:: Bacchus' Irresistible Call Note:: The USS Alexandria arrived at Bacchus 3, where they discovered Romulans trying to activate some ancient alien ruins. The Romulans have had no contact with the outside for quite some time.Previous Session: Next Session:

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-1.2-ba.title: Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-1.2-ba.description: Stardate:: 67988 Mission:: Bacchus' Irresistible Call Note:: The away team on Bacchus 3 managed to deactivate the planet's subspace distortion waves, and recover a tricorder full of valuable information with it.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-2.1-or.title: Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-2.1-or.description: Stardate:: 68063 Mission:: The Orion Heist Note:: USS Alexandria chased down an Orion freighter to recover a Tilikaal artifact. But as soon as it was recovered, a Romulan Warbird de-cloaked nearby.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-2.2-bo.title: Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-2.2-bo.description: Stardate:: 68084 Mission:: Boarded Note:: The crew fended off a Romulan boarding party while using using the artifact to boost the ship's shields subspace distortion capabilities. This lead to the ship being plunged deep into subspace temporarily.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-3-peas.title: Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-3-peas.description:
Thing Stardate:: 67913.5 Mission:: Peas to Meet You
Note:: While transporting some colonists from the Re-Alpha System to the Yacci System, a fruit called "ice peas" caused many crew members to behave in erratic and strange ways. The crew was able to identify the cause as an allergic reaction and mitigated it by introducing a local mycelium to the ice peas transport substrate.
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-3-peas.sourcePath: Shackleton Expanse/Groups/Alexandria/Sessions/Summaries/Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You.md

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.1-si.title: Alexandria Log 4.1 - Simplicity
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.1-si.description: Stardate:: 66942 Mission:: Simplicity Note:: The USS Alexandria was intercepted by Rear Admiral Banna Stoker in a beat up Romulan shuttle. The Admiral then ordered the Alexandria to send an away team down to Pasqual-1 to search for signs of the Tilikaal. On the planet, the away team activated a Tilikaal device by accident, which electrocuted the locals on the planet. Meanwhile, a Romulan warbird IRW Adjacium warped into the Pasqual system and demanded the Admiral be beamed to them and claimed the Admiral to be under Tilikaal influence.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.2-co.title: Alexandria Log 4.2 - Complexity
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.2-co.description: Stardate:: 66942 Mission:: Simplicity Note:: While the away team on Pasqual-1 investigated the strange electro-magentic field on the planet, the Alexandria was attack by a Romulan scout ship. The Romulans demanded custody of Admiral Banna Stoker, claiming that Stoker had stolen from them. After a brief firefight, the Romulan ship was disabled.Stoker was interrogated by Lt. Commander Markham, who discovered that Stoker was searching for evidence of more Tilikaal artifacts, claiming that her son had exhibited signs of Tilikaal influence and that Starfleet had covered it up. Ultimately, Stoker was arrested for attempting to destroy the Romulans in cold blood.On the Romulan ship, Relja encountered an old nemesis of his, a Tal Shiar agent who had betrayed him. Reluctantly, he repaired the scout ships broken singularity drive and let them go.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.3-gr.title: Alexandria Log 4.3 - Ground Team
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-4.3-gr.description: Stardate:: 66942 Mission:: Simplicity Note:: While the Alexandria contended wit the Romulan scout ship above, the away team was captured and put on trial by the locals on Pasqual-1. A dozen Pasqualians were killed by the obelisk's attempt to administer a genetic evolution advancement. In the end, the away team was found innocent of murder.They then went back to the obelisk, where a village elder named Jasper became amazed at the team's expertise in using it. They deactivated the obelisk, and Jasper offered to bring them to a holy site where the electromagnetic field would not affect them. This place was on the top of a mountain. On the way up, they were attack by mountain lion like creatures, and beamed up to the Alexandria as soon as they reach the peak. Jasper never got an explanation of the away team's visit, and watched them be carried away by golden light.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-5.1-bo.title: Alexandria Log 5.1 - Border Dispute
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-5.1-bo.description: Stardate:: 67097 Mission:: Border Dispute Note:: The USS Alexandria was asked by Starfleet Command to respond to a distress call from the USS Nightingale, a nova class science ship. The ship had come a little too close to an uncontacted Romulan planet and was fired upon. A Romulan warbird was claiming the crew of the Nightingale as war prisoners.Captain Cerjaso negotiated permission to send a team aboard the Nightingale to check for survivors and wounded. While performing repairs, the boarding party uncovered a Romulan disguised as a Vulcan named T'Lek amongst the crew. T'Lek attempted to escape to the Warbird, but was apprehended and beamed aboard the Alexandria after being caught stealing data from the Nightingale sensor array computers.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-5.2-im.title: Alexandria Log 5.2 - Imposter
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-5.2-im.description: Stardate:: 67097 Mission:: Border Dispute Note:: With the Romulan spy T’Lek in the Alexandria’s brig, Lt. Cmdr. Markham began an interrogation to find out who they are and what they wanted from the USS Nightingale. Meanwhile, the away team on the Nightingale was tasked with securing the ship in case of another attack. The Romulans did decide to beam aboard the Nightingale in hopes of getting T’Lek.T’Lek never revealed their intentions, but Markham decided to return T’Lek to the Romulan Warbird to prevent and further casualties on the Nightingale. Afterwards, the Alexandria was given permission to leave the system safely with the Nightingale in tow.Eelara uncovered the data stolen by T’Lek: a list of systems the Nightingale was ordered to survey by Admiral Banna Stoker.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-6-cour.title: Alexandria Log 6 - Court Martial
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-6-cour.description: Stardate:: 67175 Mission:: Order in Court Note:: During the court martial trial of Banna Stoker, the defense attorney Loxor argued that Stoker was acting within her privileges as Admiral to rescue a people in peril. Andy argued that Stoker was a danger to the Federation, having gone to the Romulans for help, instead of Starfleet command. Stoker was court martialed and sent back to earth.After weeks of preparation, the court martial for Banna Stoker was set to begin. The defense attorney was a Ferengi names Loxor, and Andy Markham took up the role of prosecutor. Plek investigated Banna Stoker's medical history and performed a psychoanalysis. He found a "fundy loop" in her brain: a short chain of neurons that fired in a loop, just enough to repeat an idea. The frequency of these brainwaves matched some of the background subspace activity found in the Bacchus system. With this information, Plek gave witness, telling the court about Stoker's condition. This brought to light the true potential of some alien influence on Stoker, even without her knowing.Loxor made the case that Stoker was only acting in the interest of Starfleet's highest ideals. She answered the call of duty, doing everything in her power to protect what she believed to be an alien civilization in peril. In addition, many of Stoker actions could be justified given her rank as admiral. The rank gives a high degree of autonomy and ability to make judgement calls without consulting her surperiors.Cmdr. Markham argued that Stoker presented a danger to the federation, having gone behind their back and put Federation officers in danger while keeping Starfleet command in the dark. Worst of all, when Stoker suspected that Starfleet would try to stop her from contacting the Tilikaal, she turned to people in the fractured Romulan Empire.In the end, Stoker was court martialed and sent backto earth to spend time with her son. While Starfleet was confident that she was no longer fit to lead in Starfleet, the trial was not able to bring to light exactly what threat the Tilikaal might pose. In particular, Stoker's son, Avery, seems to have suffered from the same alien influence as his mother. But without access to the Tilikaal artifact, it's unclear how Avery become infected with the influence at all.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-7-immi.title: Alexandria Log 7 - Imminent Collision
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-7-immi.description: Stardate:: 67253 Mission:: Imminent Collision Note:: After Narendra Station picked up an unidentified object approaching the station at high warp speeds, the Alexandria was sent to investigate while the station prepared for a potential attack. They found a strange crystalline starship and started rudimentary and cooperative communication with it.The crew found an unidentified torpedo lodged into the side of the crystalline structure, seemingly made just for the purpose of attacking this kind of starship. Once the torpedo was removed, the aliens in the ship revealed themselves: strange crystal beings who communicated through light refraction. They said thank you, and then left.

sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-8.1-ab.title: Alexandria Log 8.1 - Abyss Station
sessions/summaries/alexandria-log-8.1-ab.description: Stardate:: 67330 Mission:: Abyss Station Note:: The Alexandria followed a Romulan Warbird to a black hole with a neutronium lined space station and a singular rocky planet orbiting it. The planet had strange cultist gazing at the black hole waiting for the day it would "gaze back". The black hole was rotating to annihilate the planet with its radiation jets. On the station, the Alexandria's away team attacked a Romulan party on board.The Alexandria was sent to follow a Tal'Shiar agent to the Omega Draconis System. There, they found single rocky planet with no atmosphere but a series of underground structures about approximately 300 life signs. There was also a large space station made of obsidian-black neutronium. The Romulan warbird was also there.As the Alexandria arrived, the black hole suddenly seemed to rotate. Massive high powered radiation jets moved to expel along the galactic plane. The planet, and all ~300 people on it, stood to be annihilated. One away team went down to the planet to start an evacuation, while another went into the space station to investigate what influence it has on the black whole and see what the Romulans were doing.The team on the planet found a small group of pale humanoids with space travel capabilities but no warp capability. They spoke about how they had spent a very long gazing into the abyss waiting for the time when the abyss would gaze back at them. They seemed unconcerned about the radiation jets.Meanwhile, a rescue team infiltrated the alien space station. Inside, they found large and humanoid-shaped automatons and a series of passageways leading into the center of the station. They also found a center with cloning vats full of people much like those on the surface of the planet. At the center, they took control of one of the automatons, and then opened the door to the control room. Inside, Romulans worked to take control of the station. Seeing the away team, the Romulans opened fire.

uss-alexandria.html.title: USS Alexandria
uss-alexandria.html.description:
USS Alexandria Summary Location:: Romulan Star Empire, Shackleton Expanse/Locations/Shackleton Expanse/The Shackleton Expanse Type:: Ship
Portrait:: The NCC-65337-B: An exploration vessel assigned to the Romulan Star Empire in the Beta Quadrant.
A Federation New Orleans starship commanded by Kala Cerjaso. The Alexandria is outfitted for scout missions and pathfinding. It pushes into the edges of Federation space, makes first contact with new civilizations, and reports on astral phenomena. The crew is trained for a wide variety of circumstances, from diplomatic missions to emergency response. Federation Ship New Orleans Class Hope Ship Intelligence Division The USS Alexandria is the 2nd ship of its name. The original Alexandria was a vessel focused on making second contact. In particular, it was instrumental in maintaining an ongoing relationship with the Arcadians, who later became Federation council members.The current NCC-65337-B Alexandria was commissioned in 2373 and was assigned to explore Romulan space after a gaining favor with Romulans for it's attempts to evacuate Romulus before the Supernova
Most recently, the Alexandria was posted in the Romulan Star Empire after recent treaties granted passage to the Federation in the region. Although it is primarily an exploration vessel, a portion of the crew was assigned by Starfleet Intelligence as a counter measure to potential Romulan aggression. Among these crew members is first officer Avery Helsing, who was assigned without the captain's approval.
Alexandria Log 0 - Session 0: Stardate -The crew of the USS Alexandria was assembled and briefed for their first exploratory mission into Romulan territory.
Alexandria Log 1.1 - Bacchus-3: Stardate 67988The USS Alexandria arrived at Bacchus 3, where they discovered Romulans trying to activate some ancient alien ruins. The Romulans have had no contact with the outside for quite some time.
Alexandria Log 1.2 - Bacchus 3: Stardate 67988The away team on Bacchus 3 managed to deactivate the planet's subspace distortion waves, and recover a tricorder full of valuable information with it.
Alexandria Log 2.1 - Orion Heist: Stardate 68063USS Alexandria chased down an Orion freighter to recover a Tilikaal artifact. But as soon as it was recovered, a Romulan Warbird de-cloaked nearby.
Alexandria Log 2.2 - Boarded: Stardate 68084The crew fended off a Romulan boarding party while using using the artifact to boost the ship's shields subspace distortion capabilities. This lead to the ship being plunged deep into subspace temporarily.
Alexandria Log 3 - Peas to Meet You: Stardate 67913.5
While transporting some colonists from the Re-Alpha System to the Yacci System, a fruit called "ice peas" caused many crew members to behave in erratic and strange ways. The crew was able to identify the cause as an allergic reaction and mitigated it by introducing a local mycelium to the ice peas transport substrate.

The Admiral then ordered the Alexandria to send an away team down to Pasqual-1 to search for signs of the Tilikaal. On the planet, the away team activated a Tilikaal device by accident, which electrocuted the locals on the planet. Meanwhile, a Romulan warbird IRW Adjacium warped into the Pasqual system and demanded the Admiral be beamed to them and claimed the Admiral to be under Tilikaal influence.
Alexandria Log 4.2 - Complexity: Stardate 66942While the away team on Pasqual-1 investigated the strange electro-magentic field on the planet, the Alexandria was attack by a Romulan scout ship. The Romulans demanded custody of Admiral Banna Stoker, claiming that Stoker had stolen from them. After a brief firefight, the Romulan ship was disabled.Stoker was interrogated by Lt. Commander Markham, who discovered that Stoker was searching for evidence of more Tilikaal artifacts, claiming that her son had exhibited signs of Tilikaal influence and that Starfleet had covered it up. Ultimately, Stoker was arrested for attempting to destroy the Romulans in cold blood.On the Romulan ship, Relja encountered an old nemesis of his, a Tal Shiar agent who had betrayed him. Reluctantly, he repaired the scout ships broken singularity drive and let them go.
Alexandria Log 4.3 - Ground Team: Stardate 66942While the Alexandria contended wit the Romulan scout ship above, the away team was captured and put on trial by the locals on Pasqual-1. A dozen Pasqualians were killed by the obelisk's attempt to administer a genetic evolution advancement. In the end, the away team was found innocent of murder.They then went back to the obelisk, where a village elder named Jasper became amazed at the team's expertise in using it. They deactivated the obelisk, and Jasper offered to bring them to a holy site where the electromagnetic field would not affect them. This place was on the top of a mountain. On the way up, they were attack by mountain lion like creatures, and beamed up to the Alexandria as soon as they reach the peak. Jasper never got an explanation of the away team's visit, and watched them be carried away by golden light.

The ship had come a little too close to an uncontacted Romulan planet and was fired upon. A Romulan warbird was claiming the crew of the Nightingale as war prisoners.Captain Cerjaso negotiated permission to send a team aboard the Nightingale to check for survivors and wounded. While performing repairs, the boarding party uncovered a Romulan disguised as a Vulcan named T'Lek amongst the crew. T'Lek attempted to escape to the Warbird, but was apprehended and beamed aboard the Alexandria after being caught stealing data from the Nightingale sensor array computers.
Alexandria Log 5.2 - Imposter: Stardate 67097With the Romulan spy T’Lek in the Alexandria’s brig, Lt. Cmdr. Markham began an interrogation to find out who they are and what they wanted from the USS Nightingale. Meanwhile, the away team on the Nightingale was tasked with securing the ship in case of another attack. The Romulans did decide to beam aboard the Nightingale in hopes of getting T’Lek.T’Lek never revealed their intentions, but Markham decided to return T’Lek to the Romulan Warbird to prevent and further casualties on the Nightingale. Afterwards, the Alexandria was given permission to leave the system safely with the Nightingale in tow.Eelara uncovered the data stolen by T’Lek: a list of systems the Nightingale was ordered to survey by Admiral Banna Stoker.

Andy argued that Stoker was a danger to the Federation, having gone to the Romulans for help, instead of Starfleet command. Stoker was court martialed and sent back to earth.After weeks of preparation, the court martial for Banna Stoker was set to begin. The defense attorney was a Ferengi names Loxor, and Andy Markham took up the role of prosecutor. Plek investigated Banna Stoker's medical history and performed a psychoanalysis. But without access to the Tilikaal artifact, it's unclear how Avery become infected with the influence at all.

Inside, they found large and humanoid-shaped automatons and a series of passageways leading into the center of the station. They also found a center with cloning vats full of people much like those on the surface of the planet. At the center, they took control of one of the automatons, and then opened the door to the control room. Inside, Romulans worked to take control of the station. Seeing the away team, the Romulans opened fire. The Alexandria is equipped with dozens of shuttles. Some notable ones are listed below!

info_showCustomIcons.description: Show custom icons for files and folders

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_minCollapseDepth.description: Only allow outline items to be collapsed if they are at least this many levels deep in the tree.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_siteName.description: The name of the vault / exported site

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
